name: nucleus_MVC_noSQL
description: An API implementation of MVC structured project  in SQL (sequelize) database

replacer.name: dialect_db
replacer.ask: What is the dialect for SQL database (mysql,mariadb,sqlite,postgres,mssql,snowflake,oracle)?

replacer.name: host_db
replacer.ask: What is the host connection url for database EX: 'postgres://user:pass@example.com:5432/dbname'?

replacer.name: api_port
replacer.ask: What is the PORT where your api runs?

replacer.name: jwt_secret
replacer.ask: What is the Secure password to protect your tokens?

replacer.name: cookie_session_secret
replacer.ask: What is the Secure password to protect your cookies?
